email_verification_message: Please verify your email to complete the account registration process.
password_reset_message: Here is your password reset code
password_reset_code_valid_for_10_minutes: The password reset code is valid for 10 minutes.
password_too_short: Password must be at least 8 characters long
password_require_uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
password_require_lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
password_require_special: Password must contain at least one special character
default_strong_password_message: Your account has been created with a default strong password. Please log in and change your password immediately in the settings for security reasons.
ignore_if_not_requested: If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email.
do_not_reply: This is an automated message, please do not reply.
api_description: meobeo.ai is an AI-powered assistant for automatic meeting note-taking and summarization. It captures key discussions, analyzes important information, and generates meeting minutes efficiently, helping users save time and enhance productivity.
failed_to_download_file: Failed to download file from the provided URL.
checksum_invalid: Checksum is invalid. File may have been corrupted or tampered with.
error_analyzing_cv: An error occurred while analyzing the CV.
no_text_extracted: No text could be extracted from the provided CV.
unsupported_cv_file_type: The provided CV file type is not supported. Please upload a PDF, DOCX, or TXT file.
